snippet: Chocolate shortbread gets a slick of tart cherry jam, a thick layer of luscious dark chocolate ganache, and a salty sprinkle of fleur de sel.
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column offers a recipe for dark chocolate-cherry ganache bars for your sweetheart on Valentine's Day.
lead_paragraph: Chocolate shortbread gets a slick of tart cherry jam, a thick layer of luscious dark chocolate ganache, and a salty sprinkle of fleur de sel.

headline.seo: Plain-Jane Cookie Dresses Up for Valentine’s Day - A Good Appetite
headline.main: Plain-Jane Cookie Dolls It Up for Valentine’s Day
headline.print_headline: Plain-Jane Cookie Dolls It Up For Valentine’s Day
